lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had the 100th triple-double of his career Wednesday night and sparked a 32-8 run that sent the Dallas Mavericks past the New Orleans Hornets, 111-98, and set up a first-round showdown between the teams.
snippet: Jason Kidd had the 100th triple-double of his career Wednesday night and sparked a 32-8 run that sent the Dallas Mavericks past the New Orleans Hornets, 111-98, and set up a first-round showdown between the teams.
